definition: the part of an armchair or sofa that supports the elbow and forearm of a seated person, to supply with weapons
details:
noun
- the part of an armchair or sofa that supports the elbow and forearm of a seated person
- any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
= example: any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
= synonyms: branch, limb
- the part of a garment that is attached at the armhole and that provides a cloth covering for the arm
= synonyms: sleeve
- any instrument or instrumentality used in fighting or hunting
= synonyms: weapon, weapon system
- a human limb
= synonyms: leg
- a division of some larger or more complex organization
= synonyms: subdivision
verb
- to supply with weapons
= example: to supply with weapons
